overview: It takes a spark to build a fire and that's exactly what these couples have. Watch as playful seductions, flirty exchanges, and exhilarating touches unleash an unbridled passion between lovers sure to melt your screen! Artistically produced with rousing performances by Alison Rey, Cherie DeVille, Anikka Albrite, Abigail Mac, and more!
title: Sex & Romance 4
